mapper.select: select rno, qna_bno, products_product_id, qna_category, qna_title, users_id, qna_content, qna_date, image1, image2, image3, image4 from( select rownum as rno, qna_bno, products_product_id, qna_category, qna_title, users_id, qna_content, qna_date, image1, image2, image3, image4 from ( select qna_bno, products_product_id, qna_category, qna_title, users_id, qna_content, qna_date, image1, image2, image3, image4 from qna_boards order by qna_bno desc) where rownum <= #{endRowNo} ) where rno >= #{startRowNo}

insert.if: insert into qna_boards (qna_bno, products_product_id, qna_category, qna_title ,users_id, qna_content, qna_date) values (#{qna_bno}, 1, #{qna_category}, #{qna_title} ,#{users_id}, #{qna_content}, sysdate)

insert into qna_boards (qna_bno, products_product_id, qna_category, qna_title ,users_id, qna_content, qna_date, image1, image2, image3, image4) values (#{qna_bno}, 1, #{qna_category}, #{qna_title} ,#{users_id}, #{qna_content}, sysdate, #{image1}, #{image2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image4, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
